title: LOOKING FOR SUPPORT
body:
Im bronze 2 i need a competent support i used to be plat season 1 then took a break and when i came back i was bronze tbh i tried the past seasons to get out and back up but the support community isnt the best always in bronze. I haven't lost any of my games so far except one where i still went 15/10) (past days)
if you do decide to join me make sure u have time cause ima be flying through games
add me if interested

replies.body:
Im a support main willing to help you. I'm only S5 but I'm confidant in my skills XD I main {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:53}} but i can play all supports fairly well infact the only one i don't own is {{champion:267}} but i play her all the time when she is free! 
Feel free to add me!!!
